src

tzwrapper.cc File Reference

Detailed Description

Timezone adjustment class, wrapping the TZ environment variable to make struct tm -> time_t conversions easier.

Definition in file tzwrapper.cc.

#include "tzwrapper.h"
#include <string.h>
#include <stdio.h>
#include <string>
